name: Arachnophobia AR
description:
The concept of this game is that when you point the mobile to the target (in the attachment), a battlefield will show up, after that spiders will randomly spawn and you need to click on them to kill them.

This was my second real unity project that I took until the end.

It was done  for a course of computer engineering from Aveiro University.

This was done inside a project that had a scope of helping people deal better with their phobias.

This has a companion app that will connect to a heart rate sensor and the number of spiders will change according to that, p.ex. the number of spiders will increase on the ground if the heart rate was less then x for x time (this is disabled on this version to fully see the levels).

Some problems arouse in this game due to the fact that the spiders would not stuck to the battlefield, also they have random movement that comes from a mathematical equation that also showed difficulties.
